prompts: Create a legendary bird Pokemon that embodies the elements of fire and sky.
I want a majestic Pokemon with fiery wings and a bright yellow plumage.
Generate a mythical creature that soars through the skies with vibrant orange feathers.
Make a powerful fire-type Pokemon characterized by its stunning coloration and graceful flight.
Imagine a Pokemon that radiates warmth and energy, with flames dancing around its body.
Design a striking avian Pokemon with an elegant posture and a fiery aura.
Show me a legendary creature that captivates with its colorful feathers and fierce presence.

distinctive_features: Beak resembling a bird of prey
